meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sensuous.
meanings.sent1: Her sensuousnesses were evident in the way she appreciated the softness of the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the sensuousnesses of nature in his painting of a blooming flower.
meanings.sent3: The sensuousnesses of the chocolate cake made everyone at the party smile.
meanings.sent4: The sensuousnesses of the music enveloped the audience in a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The sensuousnesses of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: The enjoyment, expression, or pursuit of physical pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The beach vacation was filled with sensuousnesses as they basked in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: She indulged in the sensuousnesses of a relaxing massage after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The sensuousnesses of the ice cream cone brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The sensuousnesses of the dance performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The sensuousnesses of the warm bath melted away all her stress.
